name: The IDEA
description:
This Is a Zombie Multiplayer Game, It is a Playstation 2 Styled game. I will upload how to connect to multiplayer on my discord, but it will also be on youtube.

Whats New?: Removed Breathing SFX, Removed Multiple Zombie Spawners, Fixed Movement, Zombies and Players are slower (This is so multiplayer isn't scuffed).
